title: Frontend test failures: usePolling and useMail async/timing issues
description:
Pre-existing test failures in frontend (13 failed):

**Failing tests:**
- tests/unit/usePolling.test.ts (10 failed) - timeouts and act() warnings
- tests/unit/hooks/useMail.test.ts (3 failed) - error state not being set

**Root cause:** Async state updates not properly wrapped in act(), causing race conditions and timeouts.

**Discovered during:** MR gb-ihe processing (polecat/nux-mkbho53a)

**Impact:** Tests unreliable, but not blocking production code.
